translation.en: You're aging these clothes, not stirring your tea.
translation.zh: 你要让衣服变得老旧不是在搅拌茶水

translation.en: I need complete authenticity.
translation.zh: 我要完全真实的感觉

translation.en: Charlotte heard Freddie say
translation.zh: 夏洛特听到弗雷迪说

translation.en: I looked exactly like Keira Knightly.
translation.zh: 我很像凯拉奈特莉

translation.en: Right. That's done. Empty the water.
translation.zh: 行了 完成了 把水倒掉

translation.en: Not that way, fool.
translation.zh: 笨蛋 不是那边

translation.en: You'll spill it. Out the window.
translation.zh: 水会溢出来的 倒出窗外

translation.en: -Out the window? -Just get on with it.
translation.zh: -倒出窗外？-照做就是了

translation.en: Are you sure?
translation.zh: 你确定吗？

translation.en: -(gasps) -So sorry.
translation.zh: 真抱歉

translation.en: Just can't trust the help these days.
translation.zh: 现在很难找到可靠的帮手

translation.en: Do you have a pass to be out during lessons?

translation.en: Oh, yeah, I do. It's-it's right here!
translation.zh: 有啊 就在这里

translation.en: Well, don't walk on the grass!
translation.zh: 喂 别践踏草地

translation.en: For the tenth time, you need to make your bed.
translation.zh: 我说了十遍 你要整理床铺

translation.en: Jesus, what's so bloody hard?
translation.zh: 天啊 有什么难的？

translation.en: Pick up, put down. It's not rocket science.
translation.zh: 掀起来 放下去 没什么难度

translation.en: Sit down, I'll do that.
translation.zh: 坐下吧 我来弄吧

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You're freezing, you need a jumper.
translation.zh: 你冻僵了 你需要套头毛衣

translation.en: Whatever that is, I don't think I have one.
translation.zh: 我不知道那是什么 我想我没有

translation.en: I don't think I have anything thicker than prosciutto.
translation.zh: 我带的衣服全都比意大利熏火腿还要薄

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: I didn't really come prepared.
translation.zh: 我毫无准备就来了

translation.en: Didn't figure I'd be here this long.
translation.zh: 我毫无准备就来了 我没料到要待在这里那么久

translation.en: Nothing worse than the only message you get
translation.zh: 没什么比一整天只有一封

translation.en: all day being from the phone company.
translation.zh: 来自通讯公司的信息更糟

translation.en: But Matron took all the phones.
translation.zh: 可是舍监把手机都收走了啊

translation.en: No. She took all your phones.
translation.zh: 可是舍监把手机都收走了啊 不 她把你的手机都收走了

translation.en: She took our decoys.
translation.zh: 我们的那些手机是用来骗她的

translation.en: She has no idea that none of them work.
translation.zh: 她不知道那些手机都用不了

translation.en: We keep our real phones hidden.
translation.zh: 我们把真正的手机藏起来

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Call your parents, call your therapist. Knock yourself out.
translation.zh: 打给你父母 打给治疗师 随你喜欢

translation.en: But why would you do this for me?
translation.zh: 可是你为什么要帮我？

translation.en: I mean, you think I'm a total asshole.
translation.zh: 你认为我是混蛋

translation.en: No. You behave like an asshole.
translation.zh: 不是 你表现得像混蛋

translation.en: There's a difference.
translation.zh: 两者是不一样的

translation.en: Look, I know that I'm not some Malibu therapist,
translation.zh: 听好 虽然我不是马里布的治疗师

translation.en: but I can guess that you're feeling scared
translation.zh: 可是我猜得到你很害怕

translation.en: and a little bit homesick.
translation.zh: 还有点想家

translation.en: Which, in my experience,
translation.zh: 这在我看来

translation.en: doesn't actually make you a bad person. Just a normal one.
translation.zh: 不代表你是坏人 只是正常人

translation.en: Sweet photo.
translation.zh: 这张照片真好看

translation.en: Is it your mum?
translation.zh: 是你妈妈吗？

translation.en: Is she gonna come out and visit?
translation.zh: 她会来看你吗？

translation.en: She died in a car accident when I was 11.
translation.zh: 她在我11岁的时候死于车祸

translation.en: Poppy, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 帕碧 我很抱歉

translation.en: I know you're not some Malibu therapist, but, um...
translation.zh: 我知道你不是马里布的治疗师 但…

translation.en: Listen, are you serious about getting out of here?
translation.zh: 听好 你真的想离开这里吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 你真的想离开这里吗？ -是的-那你得被开除才行

translation.en: Then you're gonna have to get yourself expelled.
translation.zh: -是的-那你得被开除才行

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: "Anybody disporting themselves in an improper manner
translation.zh: “任何人以不得体的方式嬉戏

translation.en: will be proposed for expulsion before the Honor Court."
translation.zh: “任何人以不得体的方式嬉戏 校方将向荣誉法庭建议把该名学生驱逐出校”

translation.en: Wait, Honor Court?
translation.zh: 等等 荣誉法庭？

translation.en: It's like a trial, in front of the whole school, by your peers, your teachers, the head girl,
translation.zh: 就是在全校师生面前接受审判

translation.en: and Mrs. Kingsley.
translation.zh: 还有总学生长和金斯利校长

translation.en: But, I'm telling you, it hardly ever happens.
translation.zh: 但老实说 这几乎没发生过

translation.en: If you really wanna get expelled,
translation.zh: 如果你真的想被开除

translation.en: you can't just rock the boat.
translation.zh: 你不能只是无风生浪

translation.en: You have to drive it up onto the rocks,
translation.zh: 而是必须把船拖上岩石

translation.en: set fire to the galley, and dance on the burning deck.
translation.zh: 点燃帆船 在燃烧中的甲板上跳舞

translation.en: You have to take it all the way.
translation.zh: 你得狠狠地大闹一场

translation.en: Aye, aye, Captain.
translation.zh: 遵命 船长

translation.en: Make your calls.
translation.zh: 打电话吧

translation.en: Oh, tip for best reception.
translation.zh: 给你收取信号的诀窍

translation.en: On top of the cupboard.
translation.zh: 最佳位置就在壁橱的顶部

translation.en: Hi, Ruby, I miss you. I'm gonna escape, though, I promise you.
translation.zh: 嗨 露比 我很想你但我会逃走的 我答应你

translation.en: You have no idea what it's like here.
translation.zh: 你无法想象这里的情况

translation.en: Ew! Who is she?
translation.zh: 她是谁啊？

translation.en: Zero lip-gloss upkeep
translation.zh: 完全没涂唇蜜

translation.en: and what's with the sweater from Target?
translation.zh: 完全没涂唇蜜 怎么会穿着从塔吉特百货公司买来的毛衣？

translation.en: I wish you could come and rescue me.
translation.zh: 我真希望你能来救我

translation.en: Oh, she is such a romantic, Roddy.
translation.zh: 罗迪 她真爱幻想

translation.en: Take care of Roddy for me.
translation.zh: 替我照顾罗迪

translation.en: You already have. Let's hit the pool.
translation.zh: 你照顾得很好 去泳池吧

translation.en: Watch it, Wee Willie Winkie, you'll set us all alight.
translation.zh: 小心 夜猫子 你会烧死我们的

translation.en: I've had a word with the girls.
translation.zh: 我跟姐妹们都谈过了

translation.en: True, some of them took a little more convincing than others,
translation.zh: 的确 有些人要多费点唇舌才被说服

translation.en: but it's decided. We're gonna help you.
translation.zh: 但我们决定帮你一把

translation.en: We're your very own crack unit.
translation.zh: 我们是你的精锐部队

translation.en: Kiki, please explain.
translation.zh: 以进行“解放行动” -琪琪 请你解释-好的

translation.en: Right. We'll commence with an entry-level basic favorite,
translation.zh: -琪琪 请你解释-好的 我们先从入门级别的常见做法开始当作热身吧

translation.en: just to get warmed up.
translation.zh: 我们先从入门级别的常见做法开始当作热身吧

translation.en: It smells like pee in here. Does not smell like--
translation.zh: -这里有小便的味道-才没有

translation.en: (all) Bonjour, Monsieur Nellist. (Kiki) But it's not good just playing the same old tricks.
translation.zh: 但只用老把戏没有用

translation.en: Try to be as imaginative as possible.
translation.zh: 尽量发挥想象力

translation.en: Only do things that will get you noticed.
translation.zh: 只做惹人注目的事情

translation.en: Vary your targets as much as you can.
translation.zh: 目标要尽量多元化

translation.en: And although we'll all be helping you,
translation.zh: 目标要尽量多元化 虽然我们全都会帮助你

translation.en: the important thing to remember...
translation.zh: 但最重要是记住…

translation.en: (phone rings) Harriet?
translation.zh: 哈丽雅特

translation.en: ...is that you have to get the blame for everything.
translation.zh: …你得承担所有罪责

translation.en: Run along.
translation.zh: 走开吧

translation.en: Speaking.
translation.zh: 说吧

translation.en: Headphones on, girls.
translation.zh: 女孩们 戴上耳机

translation.en: Come on, everybody. Don't run too fast in your flip-flops.

translation.en: We'll just jump in, have a quick paddle about,

translation.en: warm up, then have tea and crumpets, yes?
translation.zh: 热热身 然后喝茶吃饼 好吗？

translation.en: Yes, I'm in school right now.
translation.zh: 对 我现在在学校里

translation.en: Regulation uniform? Skirt just below the knee.
translation.zh: 校服规定裙子到膝盖以下

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: They are simple polyester, sturdy and practical.
translation.zh: 料子是普通的涤纶 实际耐穿

translation.en: No, I have certainly not been naughty.
translation.zh: 不 我才不淘气

translation.en: My disciplinary record is exemplary.
translation.zh: 我的纪律良好

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: -Get out! -Get out!
translation.zh: 出去！ （淘气学生妹哈丽雅特服务殷勤 包你满意）

translation.en: (chattering)
translation.zh: 快 孩子们 快出去

translation.en: (all repeating in French)
translation.zh: -淡黄发的法语老师穿着紧身裤-淡黄发的法语老师穿着紧身裤

translation.en: (gasps)
translation.zh: -和体育老师亲热的时候被发现-和体育老师亲热的时候被发现

translation.en: (stammers)
translation.zh: -请上修道院山学校的网站浏览照片-请上修道院山学校的网站浏览照片

translation.en: Uh, yes, thank-thank you very much. That's it, thank you.

translation.en: (Kiki) If you make enough of a nuisance of yourself...
translation.zh: 若你令自己神憎鬼厌…

translation.en: Poppy... Moore!
translation.zh: 帕碧 摩尔！

translation.en: ...she will eventually bow to pressure,
translation.zh: …她便得在压力下屈服

translation.en: and she'll have to call your father.

translation.en: Naturally, I'll call her father,

translation.en: but she's had a difficult time.

translation.en: No, Sara, please, it's all right.

translation.en: -Mr. Nellist. -Oh, uh, sorry.
translation.zh: -纳黎斯特先生-抱歉

translation.en: (Kiki) And then with any luck,
translation.zh: 然后 若是幸运的话

translation.en: she'll recommend you to the Honor Court.
translation.zh: 然后 若是幸运的话 她会把你交给荣誉法庭

translation.en: Unbe-bloody-lievable!
translation.zh: 太不可思议了

translation.en: She's got more lives than a Buddhist cat.
translation.zh: 她的命比九命猫还要多

translation.en: Kingley's not even mentioned Honor Court.

translation.en: I think people are starting to like her.
translation.zh: 我想人们开始喜欢她

translation.en: People?
translation.zh: 人们吗？

translation.en: People can learn to get used to rotting pig's vomit,
translation.zh: 人们可以学习适应猪的腐烂呕吐物

translation.en: if they live with it for long enough.
translation.zh: 只要共处时间够长就行了

translation.en: I believe she's trying to leave.
translation.zh: 至少她正设法离开

translation.en: It'd be a nightmare if she stayed.
translation.zh: 若她留下来的话 就是一场噩梦

translation.en: She makes a mockery of the system.
translation.zh: 她嘲笑制度

translation.en: She's not staying, take it from me.
translation.zh: 她嘲笑制度 她不会留下来的 相信我说的话

translation.en: Five generations of my family have made the school great.
translation.zh: 我家五代人使这所学校声名远播

translation.en: The school motto is "scholarship, fellowship, loyalty,"
translation.zh: 本校校训是“勤学、友爱、忠诚”

translation.en: not "be a slutty, whorey, shit-brain."
translation.zh: 而非“淫乱、放荡、脑残”

translation.en: (both) So brillianté, Harriet.
translation.zh: -哈丽雅特 说得真妙啊-哈丽雅特 说得真妙啊

translation.en: (sobbing)
translation.zh: 我要发疯了 -喝杯浓茶 很抱歉不能更浓烈了-是啊 喝杯茶

translation.en: I'm only sorry it can't be something stronger. Cup of tea.
translation.zh: -喝杯浓茶 很抱歉不能更浓烈了-是啊 喝杯茶

translation.en: Quick, give me the tape. Give me the tape.
translation.zh: 快 把磁带给我

translation.en: Pull the button off.
translation.zh: 拔掉开关

translation.en: -Get out. -Quick.
translation.zh: -我的天啊 有车来了-快下车

translation.en: Whoa. It's all right, Cerberus, it's only me.
translation.zh: 别紧张 塞伯鲁斯 只有我一个人

translation.en: Who's Cerberus? The dog that guards the gates of hell.
translation.zh: -塞伯鲁斯是谁？-是看守地狱之门的恶犬

translation.en: (whispering)
translation.zh: -快走开-快走开

translation.en: Hurry up, or you'll disturb my girls.
translation.zh: 快点 否则你会打扰到我的女学生

translation.en: Sorry, terrible allergies.
translation.zh: 抱歉 鼻敏感超级严重

translation.en: Uh, sorry. Better an empty house than an angry tenant, right?
translation.zh: 抱歉 放出来总比憋着难受好吧？

translation.en: I don't get it. It's like you've got immunity.
translation.zh: 我搞不懂 好像你有免疫力似的

translation.en: Your dad's a mafia guy or something.
translation.zh: 你爸爸是黑手党之类的吧

translation.en: Yep, I'm the "goddaughter."
translation.zh: 对 我是教父的女儿

translation.en: Whatever it is, she's cutting you a lot of slack.
translation.zh: 无论如何 她对你真是宽容大量

translation.en: We need to up the ante.
translation.zh: 我们得加大赌注

translation.en: In fact, we need to focus on her big weakness.
translation.zh: 事实上 我们得集中攻击她最大的弱点

translation.en: Oh, my God, you have to snog Freddie.
translation.zh: 天啊 你得和弗雷迪爱爱

translation.en: Snog? That sounds disgusting. What is that?
translation.zh: “爱爱”？听起来很恶心那是什么意思？

translation.en: It's English for make out. Mrs. Kingsley will go ballistic.
translation.zh: -是“亲热”的英国说法-金斯利校长会勃然大怒

translation.en: And Harriet would have an absolute fit.
translation.zh: 哈丽雅特也会大发雷霆

translation.en: Well, that's a definite bonus.
translation.zh: 那绝对是额外收获

translation.en: And he'll be at the social. Cool.
translation.zh: -他会在联谊会上出现-很好

translation.en: Just remember, the point is to get caught.
translation.zh: 记住 重点是要被抓到

translation.en: All right, so what's the deal with the social?
translation.zh: 好的 那联谊会是干什么的？

translation.en: It's the school dance on Saturday night.
translation.zh: 是星期六晚上的学校舞会

translation.en: Traditionally, it's fancy dress.
translation.zh: 传统上是化妆舞会

translation.en: This year it's movie magic.
translation.zh: 传统上是化妆舞会 今年的主题是电影魔法

translation.en: But the only ones who bother to dress up are teachers,
translation.zh: 但真正会打扮的人只有老师们

translation.en: morons, and Harriet.
translation.zh: 笨蛋们和哈丽雅特

translation.en: I say we dress up fancy. Real fancy.
translation.zh: 我想我们得隆重其事 盛装赴会

translation.en: This mission needs to be planned precisely.
translation.zh: 我们需要精心策划这项任务

translation.en: Kiki?
translation.zh: 我们需要精心策划这项任务 琪琪？

translation.en: Okay. Operation Freedom, part two, step one.
translation.zh: 好的 “解放行动”第二回合的第一步

translation.en: Attract Freddie.
translation.zh: “解放行动”第二回合的第一步 吸引弗雷迪

translation.en: Step one, subsection "A", look the part.
translation.zh: 第一步的第一小节 好好打扮自己

translation.en: Kiki, you're actually making something quite exciting
translation.zh: 琪琪 你这么一说 原本很刺激的行动听起来却像物理作业一样

translation.en: sound like physics homework.
translation.zh: 原本很刺激的行动听起来却像物理作业一样

translation.en: Basically, we're going into town,
translation.zh: 总之我们要进城

translation.en: and we're gonna get some killer outfits.
translation.zh: 买些迷人的服装

translation.en: I want something that says elegant,
translation.zh: 我想要穿较于高贵的服装

translation.en: but at the same time incredibly slutty and available.
translation.zh: 但同时不失性感和单身魅力

translation.en: In fact, I'm not that bothered about elegance.
translation.zh: 事实上 不高贵也没关系

translation.en: "So, apparently, the key is to hook up
translation.zh: 那么显然的

translation.en: with the headmistress' son.
translation.zh: 关键就是要勾搭上校长的儿子

translation.en: I'll do your trick, Rubes, swing my hips and giggle."
translation.zh: 露比 我会用上你的绝技 摇摆臀部 咯咯娇笑

translation.en: Oh, come on, Poppy, we're gonna miss the bus.
translation.zh: 快来 帕碧 赶不上公交车了

translation.en: Don't forget to log off now, you ninny.
translation.zh: 傻瓜 别忘了登出电脑

translation.en: Everyone, sign out.
translation.zh: 大家签名登记离开

translation.en: Remember you are representatives of the school.
translation.zh: 请记住 自己代表学校

translation.en: Sign your own name, come on.
translation.zh: 只签自己的名字 快点

translation.en: Poppy Moore, what are you wearing?
translation.zh: 帕碧摩尔 你这是什么打扮？

translation.en: You are going to town,
translation.zh: 你要进城

translation.en: not appearing in a window in Amsterdam.
translation.zh: 不是去阿姆斯特丹当橱窗女郎

translation.en: I don't have anything else.
translation.zh: -马上换掉-我没别的衣服了

translation.en: I thought you might be quite concerned
translation.zh: 舍监 我早就想到你会担心

translation.en: by that attire, Matron.
translation.zh: 舍监 我早就想到你会担心 有人的服装会出问题

translation.en: So we had a little look-see in lost property
translation.zh: 因此我们到失物招领处走了一趟

translation.en: on our way here, didn't we?
translation.zh: 因此我们到失物招领处走了一趟 是不是？

translation.en: (both) We did.
translation.zh: -是的-是的

translation.en: It'll suit you,
translation.zh: 很适合你的

translation.en: promise.
translation.zh: 我保证

translation.en: (girls giggling) That's cute.
translation.zh: 真可爱 我奶奶以前也有养一只

translation.en: My grandma used to have a dog just like it.
translation.zh: 真可爱 我奶奶以前也有养一只 -相似的小狗-真棒

translation.en: Poppy, I think your jumper is the cat's pajamas.
translation.zh: -相似的小狗-真棒 帕碧 我认为你的套头衣最棒了

translation.en: Come on, girls, in you go, hurry up.
translation.zh: 来吧 女孩们 来 快上车

translation.en: Upstairs to the seats.
translation.zh: 到上层去

translation.en: Don't push. Don't push. Plenty of room.
translation.zh: 别推 还有很多位置

translation.en: Come on, here we go.
translation.zh: -快 要出发了-帕碧

translation.en: -Poppy! -Come on, Poppy!

translation.zh: -听不到 黛西在吗？-在

translation.en: Jennifer Logan?
translation.zh: 詹妮弗罗根

translation.en: Jennifer? Has anyone seen Drippy?
translation.zh: 詹妮弗 有人见过妮妮吗？

translation.en: Come on, girls. Who was the last person to see Drippy?
translation.zh: 回答我 孩子们谁最后一个见到妮妮？

translation.en: The freezer. Drippy's in the freezer!
translation.zh: 冷冻库 妮妮在冷冻库

translation.en: Hey, stop her!
translation.zh: 拦住她！

translation.en: Drippy! Drippy!
translation.zh: 妮妮！

translation.en: Drippy!
translation.zh: 妮妮！

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 发生了什么事？

translation.en: What do you think happened? Don't know yet.
translation.zh: -你觉得是怎么回事？-还不知道

translation.en: We're lucky, could've been a lot worse.
translation.zh: 我们很幸运 情况可以更糟

translation.en: Well done, Poppy, you saved us.
translation.zh: -帕碧 做得好-你救了我们

translation.en: You're brilliant.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: Hey. I believe this is yours.
translation.zh: 喂 我相信这是你的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢你-谢谢你

translation.en: Do you realize you could've killed her? Well done, thanks, Poppy.
translation.zh: -你知道你可能会害死她吗？-谢谢你 做得好

translation.en: You could've killed all of us. I didn't mean to.
translation.zh: -你可能会害死我们所有人-我不是故意的

translation.en: I thought I'd stopped it, I swear.
translation.zh: 我以为我灭火了 我发誓

translation.en: I don't understand, okay? I heard footsteps, and then I put it out.
translation.zh: 我不明白我听到脚步声 然后我灭火了

translation.en: I was just so upset at everything,
translation.zh: 我当时为所有事情感到苦恼

translation.en: and I wish I hadn't have done it.
translation.zh: 我真希望自己没有那样做

translation.en: I really wish you hadn't done it, too.
translation.zh: 我也真的希望你没有做

translation.en: Someone here knows exactly what happened last night.
translation.zh: 这里有人清楚昨晚发生了什么事

translation.en: What we're clear on is that this fire was no accident.
translation.zh: 我们都知道这场火灾不是意外

translation.en: If you have the sense to own up, no legal charges will be filed.
translation.zh: 如果你勇于认错校方就不追究法律责任

translation.en: If not, it will be passed on to the local authorities.
translation.zh: 不然就会交给当局处理

translation.en: You have until the end of the day to come forward.
translation.zh: 在今天之前 你还有机会自首

translation.en: "Dear Freddie, How can I begin to say I'm sorry?
translation.zh: 亲爱的弗雷迪 我该怎么开口道歉？

translation.en: You are good and honest and true.
translation.zh: 你善良、正直又诚恳

translation.en: And, well, I'm the opposite.
translation.zh: 而我刚好相反

translation.en: But I'm learning.
translation.zh: 但我正在学习

translation.en: So, now, I'm going to do the right thing.
translation.zh: 所以现在我要做正确的事

translation.en: And if it means I have to leave here, I just want you to know
translation.zh: 如果那意味着我必须离开这里我希望你知道

translation.en: I promise you I never wrote that e-mail.
translation.zh: 如果那意味着我必须离开这里我希望你知道 我发誓那封电邮不是我写的

translation.en: For a moment, there, yeah, you were my ticket out of here,
translation.zh: 的确 我曾经有一刹那想利用你离开这里

translation.en: but then I got to know you.
translation.zh: 但后来我开始认识你

translation.en: I have never felt this way before about anyone,
translation.zh: 我从来没有对任何人有过这种感觉

translation.en: and I really need you to know that."
translation.zh: 我一定要让你知道这一点

translation.en: Come in.
translation.zh: 进来

translation.en: Oh, what can I do for you, Poppy?
translation.zh: 帕碧 有什么事吗？

translation.en: It's what I used to start it.
translation.zh: 我用这打火机点了火

translation.en: It was an accident, and, uh, I thought I put it out.
translation.zh: 那是意外 我以为我灭火了

translation.en: But I guess not.
translation.zh: 但看来没有

translation.en: Obviously not.
translation.zh: 显然没有

translation.en: Oh, Poppy.
translation.zh: 帕碧

translation.en: You realize what this means, don't you?
translation.zh: 你了解这意味着什么吧？

translation.en: Will I be expelled?
translation.zh: 我会被开除吗？

translation.en: The Honor Court will decide,
translation.zh: 由荣誉法庭决定

translation.en: but I suspect you'll understand that it's just a formality at this point.
translation.zh: 但我想你也明白这个情况下那只是一个形式而已

translation.en: The weird thing is I really did try to turn it around.
translation.zh: 奇怪的是 我真的尝试过改变

translation.en: I didn't want to disappoint you.
translation.zh: 我不想让你失望 还有…

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: I'm so sorry, too, Poppy.
translation.zh: 帕碧 我也很抱歉

translation.en: you could give this to Freddie for me?
translation.zh: 你能替我把这个交给弗雷迪吗？

translation.en: I told her it was me.
translation.zh: 我向她自首了

translation.en: I'm going to the Honor Court and then I'll be leaving.
translation.zh: 我会上荣誉法庭 然后就要离开了

translation.en: So, this is for you.
translation.zh: 这是给你的

translation.en: Well done. You finally got what you wanted.
translation.zh: 做得好 你终于如愿以偿

translation.en: You must be overjoyed.
translation.zh: 你肯定欣喜若狂吧

translation.en: I couldn't be more unhappy.
translation.zh: 我难过得要死

translation.en: Oh, please, give it a rest.
translation.zh: 拜托 省省吧

translation.en: Mom?
translation.zh: 妈妈？

translation.en: Hey, I've been looking for you.
translation.zh: 我一直在找你

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: So, you're backed out of our deal.
translation.zh: 你破坏了协议

translation.en: What deal?
translation.zh: 什么协议？

translation.en: That you wouldn't fry my head.
translation.zh: 说好不会挑逗我的

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: But you poached my heart.
translation.zh: 但你诱惑我误坠爱河

translation.en: Hey, come on.
translation.zh: 喂 别哭了

translation.en: What if it doesn't have a moral?
translation.zh: “要是根本没有寓意呢？”

translation.en: Or says Alice.
translation.zh: 爱丽丝说的

translation.en: I think I just fell down the rabbit hole and found it.
translation.zh: 我想我刚刚掉进兔子洞找到了这张照片

translation.en: Look.
translation.zh: 你看

translation.en: She looks exactly like you.
translation.zh: 她长得跟你一模一样

translation.en: Yeah. She was my mom.
translation.zh: 对 她是我妈妈

translation.en: She went to this school.
translation.zh: 她在这所学校念过书

translation.en: I didn't even know.
translation.zh: 我居然不知道

translation.en: Well, I guess it's time to face the music now.
translation.zh: 我想是时候该接受惩罚了

translation.en: (all talking at once)
translation.zh: -你知道你说了什么吗？-是的 但我们需要…

translation.en: Josie, I'm never wrong. When am I ever wrong? You're wrong when we did the math challenge.
translation.zh: -乔茜 我没有错 我什么时候错过？-你错了…

translation.en: Hey! She's confessed.
translation.zh: -喂 她自首了-乔茜

translation.en: She's going to Honor Court this afternoon.
translation.zh: 今天下午要上荣誉法庭

translation.en: That's brave. And really stupid.
translation.zh: -真勇敢-又很蠢

translation.en: Because guess what I've discovered.
translation.zh: 你们猜我发现了什么？

translation.en: It is with great regret and sadness that we call the Honor Court to session.
translation.zh: 我们抱着遗憾和沉重的心情请求荣誉法庭开庭

translation.en: The e-mails were sent 11:40 in the morning.
translation.zh: 这些电邮是在早上11点40分发送的

translation.en: But, according to Drippy,
translation.zh: 但妮妮说

translation.en: Poppy left the computer room a few minutes after 11:00.
translation.zh: 帕碧在刚过11点就离开电脑室了

translation.en: I got my 11:00 Wagon Wheel,
translation.zh: 我在11点吃完巧克力车轮饼

translation.en: and then I went to tell her that Freddie was waiting.
translation.zh: 然后跑去告诉她弗雷迪在等她

translation.en: She left immediately.
translation.zh: 她立刻就走了

translation.en: I was able to access the keystroke order
translation.zh: 我成功存取原始档案的键入次序

translation.en: of the root file to find out who else
translation.zh: 我成功存取原始档案的键入次序 以找出那时候还有谁登入电脑

translation.en: was logged on there then.
translation.zh: 以找出那时候还有谁登入电脑

translation.en: And guess who the only other person was?
translation.zh: 你们猜那个人是谁？

translation.en: Who?
translation.zh: 是谁？

translation.en: It will henceforth be our job to objectively and dispassionately ascertain
translation.zh: 因此我们的职责是要客观公正地查明

translation.en: what happened that fateful night.
translation.zh: 火灾当晚发生了什么事情

translation.en: That will hence to forth long blight the memory of this proud institution.
translation.zh: 而这场火灾将在这所辉煌的学府留下难堪的一页

translation.en: When you think about it, Poppy would never say "term".
translation.zh: 仔细一想 帕碧从不说“学期结束”

translation.en: She calls it a bloody samosa or something.
translation.zh: 她是说“期莫”什么的

translation.en: -Semester. -Whatever.
translation.zh: -是“期末”-随便啦

translation.en: Anyway, to check the reality,
translation.zh: 总而言之 为了查出真相

translation.en: I had a sneaky look in her diary for Friday's entry.
translation.zh: 我偷看了她周五写的日记

translation.en: Don't do that.
translation.zh: 别那样做

translation.en: Shut up and listen.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 先听听吧

translation.en: "I think, deep breath, I kind of love them
translation.zh: “我想在心底里 我真的爱上她们了

translation.en: like proper friends I've known forever.
translation.zh: 就像认识了一辈子的朋友

translation.en: They've made me say words like 'horridious' and 'herbal.'
translation.zh: 她们要我说 ‘讨厌又荒唐’和‘草药’

translation.en: Which is sort of whack, and I'd probably hate them if I wasn't one of them.
translation.zh: 不太酷 如果我不是她们的一分子会讨厌这些字眼吧

translation.en: But I like that I'm now one of them."
translation.zh: 但我喜欢成为她们的一员”

translation.en: Apart from some atrocious spelling mistakes,
translation.zh: 除了糟透的拼写错误

translation.en: it's a little bit more kosher, don't you think?
translation.zh: 看来合理多了 不是吗？

translation.en: And now she's gonna get thrown out.
translation.zh: 现在她要被开除了

translation.en: It is your duty to understand the dark forces
translation.zh: 你们有义务知道 黑暗势力主导了看似…

translation.en: that drove a seemingly--
translation.zh: 黑暗势力主导了看似…

translation.en: Harriet.
translation.zh: 哈丽雅特

translation.en: May I remind you that the Honor Court is no place for your personal grandstanding.
translation.zh: 我要提醒你荣誉法庭不是让你哗众取宠的地方

translation.en: Look, Poppy has a right to speak in her own defense
translation.zh: 而且帕碧有权为自己辩护

translation.en: before the court, as a whole, passes judgment.
translation.zh: 然后法庭自然会作出裁决

translation.en: Thank you, Mrs. Kingsley.
translation.zh: 金斯利校长 谢谢你

translation.en: I won't insult everybody by trying to defend myself or my actions.
translation.zh: 我不想为我或我的行为辩护免得侮辱了大家

translation.en: So, uh, I think it's safe to say that I've... I've really messed up,
translation.zh: 我想我可以说我真的搞砸了

translation.en: and I apologize profusely.
translation.zh: 我深感抱歉

translation.en: But I'm also so grateful to you all.
translation.zh: 同时我很感激大家

translation.en: I tried really hard to get out of this school.
translation.zh: 我曾经千方百计想离开这所学校

translation.en: And, only now, do I realize just how much I want to stay.
translation.zh: 但到现在我才发现自己有多想留下来

translation.en: I've learned so much being here, being with all of you.
translation.zh: 我在这里跟你们所有人学到很多

translation.en: And, in some ways, being with my mom,
translation.zh: 从某个角度来看也可以说我和妈妈重逢了

translation.en: who I found out was actually a student here.
translation.zh: 原来她曾经是这里的学生

translation.en: I've had a hole in my heart for five years,
translation.zh: 这五年以来 我的心一直有个伤口 然后

translation.en: and somehow being here,
translation.zh: 不知怎的 来到这里之后

translation.en: it slowly started to heal.
translation.zh: 伤口开始慢慢愈合

translation.en: I know I may have looked like a California girl,
translation.zh: 我知道我看起来像加州女孩 但是

translation.en: but in my heart I've discovered
translation.zh: 我知道我看起来像加州女孩 但是 我发现我内心其实是修道院山的女孩

translation.en: that I really am an Abbey Mount girl.
translation.zh: 我发现我内心其实是修道院山的女孩

translation.en: Objection! Sustained.
translation.zh: 反对 有效

translation.en: The court will heretofore disregard the previous statement.
translation.zh: 法庭对先前陈词不予理会

translation.en: And perhaps heretofore we can begin the real business.
translation.zh: 也许我们可以开始审问程序

translation.en: Can you tell us, in your own words,
translation.zh: 请你用自己的话告诉大家

translation.en: where were you on the aforementioned evening of--
translation.zh: 事发当晚 你在哪里…

translation.en: Honestly, Harriet, who else's words do you expect her to use?
translation.zh: 哈丽雅特 说实在你觉得她还能用谁的话来说？

translation.en: Just leave this to me.
translation.zh: 交给我吧

translation.en: Right. Sustained.
translation.zh: 好吧 反对有效

translation.en: Poppy, were you in the cook's sitting room
translation.zh: 帕碧 火灾当晚你在厨师的休息室吗？

translation.en: -on the night of the fire? -Yes, I was.
translation.zh: 帕碧 火灾当晚你在厨师的休息室吗？ 是的

translation.en: Were you there with permission?
translation.zh: 你到那里有获得批准吗？

translation.en: No, I was not.
translation.zh: 没有 我并没有

translation.en: Silence in court.
translation.zh: 安静一点 法庭内得保持肃静

translation.en: Did you intend on starting a fire?
translation.zh: 你是故意纵火的吗？

translation.en: -Not really. -Objection!
translation.zh: 不算是 反对 被告是承认还是否认？

translation.en: Does the defendant mean yes or no?
translation.zh: 反对 被告是承认还是否认？

translation.en: -Harriet? -It means no.
translation.zh: 哈丽雅特 我否认 我不是故意放火的

translation.en: I had no intention of actually doing it.
translation.zh: 我否认 我不是故意放火的

translation.en: Was anyone else with you?
translation.zh: 当时有别人在场吗？

translation.en: Not as far as I know.
translation.zh: 就我所知没有

translation.en: I was.
translation.zh: 我在场

translation.en: I was.
translation.zh: 我在场

translation.en: -I was. -I was.
translation.zh: -我在场-我在场

translation.en: -I was. -I was.
translation.zh: -我在场-我在场

translation.en: I was. -I was. -I was.
translation.zh: -我在场-我在场

translation.en: -I was. -I was. (all) I was.
translation.zh: -我在场-我在场

translation.en: Objection! Stop! Order!
translation.zh: -反对 停下来 保持秩序-我在场

translation.en: -I was. -I was. -Stop it! -Come on.
translation.zh: -我在场-停下来！

translation.en: I was.
translation.zh: -说吧-我在场

translation.en: This is ridiculous!
translation.zh: 真是荒唐

translation.en: What are you all doing? You're lying.
translation.zh: 你们这是干什么？都在撒谎

translation.en: They're lying, Mrs. Kingsley.
translation.zh: 金斯利校长 她们在撒谎

translation.en: Harriet, you're going down, biatch.
translation.zh: 哈丽雅特 你死定了 臭婆娘

translation.en: This is a conspiracy.
translation.zh: 这是个阴谋

translation.en: You can't expel the whole year, and they know that.
translation.zh: 你不能把整个年级开除她们深知这一点

translation.en: Be quiet, Harriet!
translation.zh: 安静 哈丽雅特

translation.en: Sit down, everyone.
translation.zh: 各位 请坐下

translation.en: It's a black-and-white case.
translation.zh: 这案件毫无悬念

translation.en: She has to be expelled.
translation.zh: 她必须被开除

translation.en: The girl set fire to the school,
translation.zh: 这女孩在学校纵火

translation.en: endangering all our precious lives.
translation.zh: 威胁大家宝贵的生命

translation.en: She walked in there, lighter at the ready,
translation.zh: 她走到里面去 准备好打火机

translation.en: and tried to burn the place down.
translation.zh: 想把这所学校烧掉

translation.en: Lighter?
translation.zh: 打火机？

translation.en: Not now, Jane. Have respect for court protocol.
translation.zh: 轮不到你说话 珍 请尊重法庭规矩

translation.en: What lighter, Harriet?
translation.zh: 哈丽雅特 什么打火机？

translation.en: Jesus, Charlotte, how daft can you possibly be?
translation.zh: 天啊 夏洛特 你到底有多笨？

translation.en: That ridiculous I heart L.A. lighter of hers.
translation.zh: 她那个可笑的打火机上面写着“我爱洛杉矶”

translation.en: She left it behind, for God's sakes.
translation.zh: 她把它留在现场了

translation.en: Except how do you know that, Harriet?
translation.zh: 但是… 哈丽雅特 你怎么会知道？

translation.en: No one's mentioned a lighter before.
translation.zh: 没有人提过打火机

translation.en: (whispers) What? Yes, they have.
translation.zh: 什么？当然有

translation.en: Objection.
translation.zh: 反对

translation.en: Actually, Harriet, they haven't.
translation.zh: 事实上 哈丽雅特 没有人提起过

translation.en: I have to second Jane's question, Harriet.
translation.zh: 我同意珍的疑问 哈丽雅特

translation.en: How did you know about that lighter?
translation.zh: 你是怎么知道打火机的事情的？

translation.en: Well, I-I had--
translation.zh: 那个 我听说…

translation.en: Freddie found the lighter before anyone saw it.
translation.zh: 弗雷迪在别人看见之前找到了打火机

translation.en: How could you possibly know unless...
translation.zh: 你不可能知道 除非…

translation.en: unless you were there.
translation.zh: 除非你当时在现场？

translation.en: Well, this is absurd. I refuse to sit here and listen to these wild--
translation.zh: 真是荒谬 我拒绝坐在这里听这些…

translation.en: I had put it out.
translation.zh: 我把火扑灭了

translation.en: And I heard footsteps. It must've been you.
translation.zh: 然后听到脚步声 一定是你

translation.en: Oh, my God, you restarted the fire, didn't you?
translation.zh: 我的天啊 是你重新点火的 对吧？

translation.en: Harriet, is this true? Of course not.
translation.zh: -哈丽雅特 是真的吗？-当然不是

translation.en: It all makes sense now, I knew it.
translation.zh: 真相大白了 我就知道

translation.en: I think I'm innocent.
translation.zh: 我想我是无辜的

translation.en: (both) We think so, too.
translation.zh: -我们也赞成-我们也赞成

translation.en: You're not, you awful bitch!
translation.zh: 你有罪！你这贱货！

translation.en: You've turned this school upside down.
translation.zh: 你把学校闹得天翻地覆

translation.en: You've ruined everything! You started it.
translation.zh: 你毁了一切 是你放的火

translation.en: I only finished what you started!
translation.zh: 我只是完成了你开始的事情

translation.en: Harriet?
translation.zh: 哈丽雅特

translation.en: My office, now.
translation.zh: 马上到我的办公室来

translation.en: (cheering)
translation.zh: -修道院山队 加油-修道院山队 加油

translation.en: Okay, suckers, show time.
translation.zh: 好了 笨蛋们 看我们表演吧

translation.en: Let's open a can of whoop-ass.
translation.zh: 杀她们个片甲不留 -修道院山-加油 修道院山

translation.en: Come on, Abbey Mount. You can do it!
translation.zh: -修道院山-加油 修道院山 -你们做得到的-加油 修道院山

translation.en: Let's go Abbey Mount!
translation.zh: 上啊 修道院山队

translation.en: Come on, girls.
translation.zh: 孩子们 加油

translation.en: Take it! Come on!
translation.zh: 接住 来吧

translation.en: (cheering)
translation.zh: （修道院山队0：斯托队0）

translation.en: Come on, guys, we can bring it back. Let's go.
translation.zh: 别放弃 我们能追回来的 上吧

translation.en: You got it!
